title: Motor Trend's Jonny Lieberman
description:
Jonny Lieberman is the host of Motor Trend's "Head2Head" and "Ignition." He flies around the world driving the best cars, and has a great depth of knowledge. He's on the show to talk about World's Greatest Drag Race 8, and his travels. Watch him at https://www.motortrendondemand.com/

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/p-JLVc3_KrM

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @mtloverman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @jonnylieberman

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1

 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
